author: Lon.TV
description:
Buy one on Amazon: https://lon.tv/120u4 (compensated affiliate link) - Wyze's latest camera grafts a stationary Wyze camera to a movable one. We'll dive into its features in this review. See more Wyze :https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIsj8ifUW1LyT84jt_RI1bw5 and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

05:10 - Automatic motion tracking
06:00 - Event Playback - Non-subscribers need an SD card!
07:58 - More on SD Cards - Continuous recording & max size
09:02 - Paywalled Features

title: Wyze Duo Cam Pan Review : Pan and Tilt Camera Grafted to a Stationary One
